mapper.select:
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM s3m_customer WHERE customer_id IN
#{customerId}

SELECT A.customer_id, A.customer_name, A.customer_code, A.description, A.update_date FROM s3m_customer A WHERE (A.customer_name like "%${keyword}%" OR A.customer_code like "%${keyword}%" OR A.description like "%${keyword}%") AND A.delete_flag != 1
SELECT A.customer_id, A.customer_name, A.customer_code, A.description, A.update_date FROM s3m_customer A WHERE A.delete_flag != 1
mapper.insert: INSERT into s3m_customer(customer_name, description, customer_code) values (#{customerName}, #{customerDesc}, #{customerCode});
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(customer_id) as id_schema FROM s3m_plus.s3m_customer
mapper.update: Update s3m_customer SET customer_name = #{customerName}, description = #{description}, customer_code = #{customerCode} where customer_id = #{customerId}
mapper.select:
SELECT distinct A.customer_id, A.customer_name, A.customer_code, A.description, A.update_date FROM s3m_customer A LEFT JOIN s3m_user B ON A.customer_id = B.customer_id WHERE A.customer_id IS NOT NULL
AND B.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT * FROM s3m_customer A WHERE A.customer_id IS NOT NULL
AND A.manager_id = #{managerId}

SELECT * FROM s3m_customer A LEFT JOIN s3m_project B ON A.customer_id = B.customer_id WHERE A.customer_id IS NOT NULL
AND B.project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT * FROM s3m_customer A LEFT JOIN s3m_manager B ON A.manager_id = B.manager_id LEFT JOIN s3m_super_manager C ON B.super_manager_id = C.id WHERE A.customer_id IS NOT NULL
AND C.id = #{superManagerId}
SELECT SUM(A.p_total) FROM s3m_data_load_frame_1_2022 A JOIN s3m_device B ON A.device_id = B.device_id JOIN s3m_project C ON B.project_id = C.project_id WHERE C.customer_id =${customerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s3m_otp_data(otp_code, user_id, customer_id, status, create_date) VALUES (#{otpCode}, #{userId}, #{customerId}, #{status}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT A.user_id AS userId, A.customer_id AS customerId, A.create_date AS createDate, A.otp_code AS otpCode FROM s3m_otp_data A JOIN s3m_user B ON A.user_id = B.user_id WHERE B.username = #{userName} AND A.customer_id = #{customerId} AND A.status = 0 ORDER BY A.create_date DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT customer_id FROM s3m_customer ORDER BY customer_id ASC LIMIT 1;
SELECT customer_ids FROM s3m_user WHERE username = #{userName}
SELECT A.customer_id, A.customer_name, A.customer_code, A.description, A.update_date FROM s3m_customer A WHERE A.delete_flag != 1 AND A.customer_id IN (${ids})
